name: Biking full day Long Tan and Nui Dat
description: Transfer out of te city and bike ride on road to the first stop, the site of the former Nui Dat Task Force base. Little remains of the.vast camp except the columns of the main gate. The former runway is now a wide street in the local village and what was the heli-pad is now a soccer field. A school established by Australian veterans is nearby.
